name: Z HOUSE NEW YORK
description:
IT'S JUNE 9TH,1992 I AM DETECTIVE JOSHUA RIVERA,I DON'T KNOW WHAT THE FUCK IS GOING ON,BUT IT'S NOT PRETTY. I'VE SEEN THINGS,THINGS THAT ARE ONLY SEEN IN HORROR FLICKS PEOPLE EATING PEOPLE IT'S FUCKING SICK!! ALL I KNOW IS I GOT TO GET ACROSS TOWN TO MY WIFE AND DAUGHTER,AND I WILL NOT LET ANYONE OR ANYTHING GET IN MY WAY!!

THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT AND DONATIONS!!! HELP US CREATE BETTER GAMES!!! -MALIK BRUNO

CONTROLS:

WASD-MOVE AROUND

MOUSE -MOVE IN ANY DIRECTION/AIM

MOUSE CLICK-FIRE GUN

SPACE-PAUSE/MENU

SOME DIALOG IS IN SPANISH BUT VERY PLAYABLE TO ALL LANGUAGES.
